title: Send a Post-Purchase Survey
description: A day after a customer's online order is delivered, the system automatically sends them a request to review the products they purchased.

tasks.description: The system identifies orders that were marked as 'Delivered' yesterday.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of eligible customers is generated.

tasks.description: The system sends an email to each customer asking them to review their recent purchases.
The email contains direct links for the customer to leave a star rating and a comment for each product.
tasks.expected_outcome: The process for leaving a review is made easy for the customer, increasing the likelihood of getting feedback.
